Posts.Title: whats difference between orthovoltage radiation and megavoltage radiation?

Posts.Content: Radiation Therapy is the main line of treatment for much of the breast cancer after Surgery and Chemotherapy. Radiotherapy to breast cancer significantly decreases the local recurrence rate. Its a very much safe treatment modality in this modern era of technology. With precise location of tumor known, we can achieve maximum radiation dose to the tumor with minimal dose to organs at risk. Though its very precise, there seem to occur side effects. Every patient who are on going radiation therapy must be reviewed once in a week for radiation induced side effects.
